t: Luxury Hotels & Resorts: Mindful Experiences | JW Marriott
s: March 12, 2025 - Discover classic luxury in JW Marriott hotels, with mindful experiences and inspiring spaces to improve your well-being and enrich your mind, body and soul.

3 days ago - The JW Marriott brand was established in 1984, with the opening of the first hotel in Washington, D.C. It was named as a tribute to J.W. Marriott, the founder of Marriott Corporation. In 1989, Hong Kong was the destination for the overseas launch. Europe and the Middle East followed in 1993.

t: Marriott Brands: What to Know - NerdWallet
s: December 25, 2024 - Premium hotels under the JW Marriott brand can range in size from small hotels to mega-size resorts. Many JW Marriotts operate club levels, giving elite-member guests access. A number of JW Marriotts have ample meeting space, recreational facilities and fine dining options.
